SINGLE RUN CONFIGURATION SCHEMA
================================

REQUIRED FIELDS:
  • prompt      (string)  - Task description/instructions for the AI
  • repository  (string)  - Repository in format 'owner/repo' (auto-detected in git repos)

OPTIONAL FIELDS:
  • target      (string)  - Target branch name for changes (default: auto-generated)
  • title       (string)  - Human-readable title for the run (default: auto-generated)
  • source      (string)  - Source branch (default: 'main', auto-detected in git repos)
  • runType     (string)  - Type: 'run' or 'plan' (default: 'run')
  • context     (string)  - Additional context or instructions
  • files       (array)   - List of specific files to include

RUN TYPES:
  • run      - AI makes changes and creates PR automatically
  • plan     - AI creates detailed plan without code changes

EXAMPLES:
  repobird examples generate          # Generate JSON example
  repobird examples generate -f yaml  # Generate YAML example
  repobird examples generate -f md    # Generate Markdown example
